title: Smart Desk site: update domain and add pamphlet/images section to Home page

requirements.summary: Update centralized institute website domain to www.smartdesk7.com so Footer and Contact page links update consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: The website link shown in the Site Footer opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab.
The website link shown on the Contact page opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing instituteDetails.website value (currently "www.smartdesk.in") with exactly "www.smartdesk7.com" so all consumers (e.g., SiteFooter, ContactPage) display/link the updated domain consistently.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded pamphlet and image as public static assets and show them in a dedicated, responsive Home page section with larger-view support.
acceptanceCriteria: Both images are added to the repository under a public static path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/uploads/ or similar) and load correctly in the browser.
Home page includes a clearly labeled section that displays both images with appropriate alt text (English).
Images are responsive (fit on mobile/desktop without overflowing) and can be viewed at larger size (e.g., open in a new tab or via an in-page viewer/modal).

file_operations.description: Add the user-uploaded pamphlet image as a public static asset so it can be referenced by the Home page section.
Add the user-uploaded image as a public static asset so it can be referenced by the Home page section.

Add a dedicated, clearly labeled section on the Home page that displays both uploaded images from frontend/public/assets/uploads/SDPH-1.jpg and frontend/public/assets/uploads/1000_F_755840623_3JuwWAI0IdvB5xOmCIqvUZmPyfLoHd3M-1.jpg with English alt text, responsive layout (no overflow on mobile/desktop), and a larger-view option by linking each image to its full-size asset in a new tab (target="_blank" + rel="noopener noreferrer").
